Descripción del mercado laboral a partir de la ENAHO (parte 3)

El objetivo de este post es describir los cambios en el mercado laboral durante la pandemia a partir de la Encuesta Nacional de Hogares (ENAHO).

enaho

graficos

Setup

#importar los necesarios
pacman::p_load(
  #Working directory
  here,
  #data tools
  tidyverse, janitor, glue, scales, Hmisc,
  #importar / exportar
  haven, rio,
  #Etiquetas
  sjlabelled,
  #tablas
  xtable, flextable, knitr, kableExtra, DT, gtsummary, gt,
  #Trabajar con encuestas
  survey, srvyr
  )

#Set working directory de manera relativa
here::i_am("tablas3_tesis/index.qmd")

Data

base1<-read_sav(file=here("bases_datos/enaho_19_20_21.sav"))

Función tabla 1

tabla1<-function(data, weight, strata, include, sin_nacional=FALSE){

  tbl1<-
  data %>%
    mutate(nacional="Nacional") %>% 
    labelled::drop_unused_value_labels() %>% 
    haven::as_factor() %>% 
    as_survey_design(weight = {{weight}}) %>% 
    tbl_strata(
      strata = {{strata}},
      .tbl_fun =
        ~ .x %>%
          tbl_svysummary(
            include = nacional,
            statistic = everything()~"{n} ({p}%)",
            digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
            percent = "column",
            missing = "no") %>%
        bold_labels() %>% 
        remove_row_type(nacional, type = "header") %>% 
        modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                      update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
        modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA) %>% 
        bold_levels() %>%
        modify_column_indent(columns = label, undo = TRUE)
)


etiqueta<-data %>% select({{include}}) %>%  get_label()

tbl2<-
base1 %>%
  labelled::drop_unused_value_labels() %>% 
  haven::as_factor() %>% 
  as_survey_design(weight = {{weight}}) %>% 
  tbl_strata(
    strata = {{strata}},
    .tbl_fun =
      ~ .x %>%
        tbl_svysummary(
          include = {{include}},
          label = everything() ~ etiqueta,
          statistic = everything()~"{n} ({p}%)",
          digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
          percent = "column",
          missing = "no") %>%
      bold_labels() %>% 
      modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                    update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
      modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA),
    .header = "**{strata}**"
  )
 
  if(sin_nacional==FALSE) {
    tbl_stack(list(tbl1, tbl2))
  } else {
    tbl2
  }
}

Tablas verticales

theme_gtsummary_journal("jama")
tbl_stack(
  list(
    base1 %>% tabla1(weight = fac500a, include = dominio, strata = ano),
    base1 %>% tabla1(weight = fac500a, include = estrato, strata = ano, sin_nacional = TRUE)
  ))

```{r}
#importar los necesarios
pacman::p_load(
  #Working directory
  here,
  #data tools
  tidyverse, janitor, glue, scales, Hmisc,
  #importar / exportar
  haven, rio,
  #Etiquetas
  sjlabelled,
  #tablas
  xtable, flextable, knitr, kableExtra, DT, gtsummary, gt,
  #Trabajar con encuestas
  survey, srvyr

#Set working directory de manera relativa
here::i_am("tablas3_tesis/index.qmd")
```

# Función tabla 1

```{r funcion tabla1}
tabla1<-function(data, weight, strata, include, sin_nacional=FALSE){

  tbl1<-
  data %>%
    mutate(nacional="Nacional") %>% 
    labelled::drop_unused_value_labels() %>% 
    haven::as_factor() %>% 
    as_survey_design(weight = {{weight}}) %>% 
    tbl_strata(
      strata = {{strata}},
      .tbl_fun =
        ~ .x %>%
          tbl_svysummary(
            include = nacional,
            statistic = everything()~"{n} ({p}%)",
            digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
            percent = "column",
            missing = "no") %>%
        bold_labels() %>% 
        remove_row_type(nacional, type = "header") %>% 
        modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                      update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
        modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA) %>% 
        bold_levels() %>%
        modify_column_indent(columns = label, undo = TRUE)
)


etiqueta<-data %>% select({{include}}) %>%  get_label()

tbl2<-
base1 %>%
  labelled::drop_unused_value_labels() %>% 
  haven::as_factor() %>% 
  as_survey_design(weight = {{weight}}) %>% 
  tbl_strata(
    strata = {{strata}},
    .tbl_fun =
      ~ .x %>%
        tbl_svysummary(
          include = {{include}},
          label = everything() ~ etiqueta,
          statistic = everything()~"{n} ({p}%)",
          digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
          percent = "column",
          missing = "no") %>%
      bold_labels() %>% 
      modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                    update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
      modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA),
    .header = "**{strata}**"
  )
 
  if(sin_nacional==FALSE) {
    tbl_stack(list(tbl1, tbl2))
  } else {
    tbl2
  }
}

```

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
base1 %>%
    mutate(nacional="Nacional") %>% 
    haven::as_factor() %>% 
    as_survey_design(weight = fac500a) %>% 
    tbl_strata(
      strata = ano,
      .tbl_fun =
        ~ .x %>%
          tbl_svysummary(
            include = nacional,
            statistic = everything()~"{p}",
            #digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
            digits = all_categorical() ~ list(p ~ style_sigfig),
            percent = "column",
            missing = "no") %>%
        bold_labels() %>% 
        remove_row_type(nacional, type = "header") %>% 
        modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                      update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
        modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA) %>% 
        bold_levels() %>%
        modify_column_indent(columns = label, undo = TRUE) #%>% modify_fmt_fun(update = stat_0 ~ purrr::partial(style_number, scale = 1/10))
)
```



```{r, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
base1 %>%
    mutate(nacional="Nacional") %>% 
    haven::as_factor() %>% 
    as_survey_design(weight = fac500a) %>% 
    tbl_strata(
      strata = ano,
      .tbl_fun =
        ~ .x %>%
          tbl_svysummary(
            include = nacional,
            statistic = everything()~"{n} ({p}%)",
            digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
            percent = "column",
            missing = "no") %>%
        bold_labels() %>% 
        remove_row_type(nacional, type = "header") %>% 
        modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                      update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
        modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA) %>% 
        bold_levels() %>%
        modify_column_indent(columns = label, undo = TRUE) #%>% modify_fmt_fun(update = stat_0 ~ purrr::partial(style_number, scale = 1/10))
)


etiqueta<-base1 %>% get_label(dominio)

base1 %>%
  haven::as_factor() %>% 
  # as_label() %>% 
  # unlabel() %>% 
  as_survey_design(weight = fac500a) %>% 
  tbl_strata(
    strata = ano,
    .tbl_fun =
      ~ .x %>%
        tbl_svysummary(
          #by = {{by}},
          include = dominio,
          label = dominio ~ etiqueta,
          statistic = everything()~"{n} ({p}%)",
          digits = all_categorical()~c(0, 2),
          percent = "column",
          missing = "no") %>%
      #add_overall(col_label = "Total") %>%
      bold_labels() %>% 
      modify_header(label = md("**Variable**"),
                    update = stat_0 ~ "Total (%)") %>% 
      modify_footnote(update = everything() ~ NA),# %>% 
      #modify_fmt_fun(c(stat_0) ~ style_number),
      #modify_fmt_fun(update = stat_0 ~ function(x) style_number(x, scale = 1 / 1000)),
    # .header = "**Año**"
    #.combine_with = "tbl_merge"
    .header = "**{strata}**"
    #.header = "**{strata} <br> Nacional = {n}**"
    # .combine_with = "tbl_merge",
    # .combine_args = list(group_header = NULL),
    # .quiet = TRUE,
    # .stack_group_header = TRUE
  )# %>% modify_header(
    # stat_01 ~ "Nacional = {n}",
    # stat_02 ~ "Nacional = {n}",
    # stat_03 ~ "Nacional = {n}"
    # )
```
